item.title: Lecture 4: Mapping Reads I
item.description: WarmUp with Python Numbers Open this notebook Make a copy of it in your drive Go through it and execute all cells In the previous lecture we uploaded data and performed QC. The outcome of this analysis is a set of Illumina reads that are ready to be mapped. Before we map we should understand the theory behind this process. Mapping versus alignment One possible idea on how to speed things up will be to first find most likely locations for each read and them refine alignments as necessary.
